data.text: Meisho Doto and I were supposed to train today, but...
data.processed: <story>Meisho Doto and I were supposed to train today, but...

data.text:
She's not the type to slack off on training, so I figured she might 
have run into some trouble, and went looking for her.
data.processed:
<story>She's not the type to slack off on training, so I figured she might 
<story>have run into some trouble, and went looking for her.

data.text:
After around ten minutes of looking around the school―― 
I found her trembling in front of the flowerbed, her back muddied 
brown.
data.processed:
<story>After around ten minutes of looking around the school―― 
<story>I found her trembling in front of the flowerbed, her back muddied 
<story>brown.

data.text: Boohoo................... Huwuuuuuuhhhhhhh.... Pat pat, pat pat, pat pat...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: Boohoo................... Huwuuuuuuhhhhhhh.... Pat pat, pat pat, pat pat...

data.text: Whhau!? Ah, T- Trainer-san...!?
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: Whhau!? Ah, T- Trainer-san...!?

data.text:
Ah! Well, umm...! There's an unavoidable reason for... 
well, it was avoidable, sort of, you could say――
data.name: Meisho Doto

choices.text: You should go get changed first!

data.processed:
<story>Ah! Well, umm...! There's an unavoidable reason for... 
<story>well, it was avoidable, sort of, you could say――

data.text: R- right...!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: <story>R- right...!

data.text:
I helped wash her filthy jersey and set it out to dry. 
With that out of the way, I once again asked her what happened.
data.processed:
<story>I helped wash her filthy jersey and set it out to dry. 
<story>With that out of the way, I once again asked her what happened.

data.text:
――Well, I thought I would get some practice in myself before 
training... So I went on a little run.
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>――Well, I thought I would get some practice in myself before 
<story>training... So I went on a little run.

data.text:
When I was around the flower beds, I slipped and fell... 
And it's just my luck I fell onto a messy spot...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>When I was around the flower beds, I slipped and fell... 
<story>And it's just my luck I fell onto a messy spot...

data.text:
Riiight... Ah, b-but the silver lining is, there wasn't anything 
planted there!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>Riiight... Ah, b-but the silver lining is, there wasn't anything 
<story>planted there!

data.text:
I left a big outline of my body in the soil, so I was trying to fix it 
by going pat pat, pat pat... Like that...
data.name: Meisho Doto

choices.text: Right, now I get why you were late.

data.processed:
<story>I left a big outline of my body in the soil, so I was trying to fix it 
<story>by going pat pat, pat pat... Like that...

data.text:
Augh! S-sorry... 
A-are you mad...? You are, aren't you?
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>Augh! S-sorry... 
<story>A-are you mad...? You are, aren't you?

data.text:
She had a good reason for being late, so that I could take in 
stride. The real issue was――

choices.text: I'd like a heads-up if you go practice alone.
choices.processed: <size=38>I'd like a heads-up if you go practice alone.</size>

data.processed:
<story>She had a good reason for being late, so that I could take in 
<story>stride. The real issue was――

data.text:
What...? No, but... 
Then I wouldn't really be practicing alone...
data.name: Meisho Doto

choices.text: But that way, I can give you advice.

data.processed:
<story>What...? No, but... 
<story>Then I wouldn't really be practicing alone...

data.text:
It's something I was doing for my own sake... 
It just doesn't feel right to make even more trouble for you to 
deal with――
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>It's something I was doing for my own sake... 
<story>It just doesn't feel right to make even more trouble for you to 
<story>deal with――

data.text:
I- I mean... just today I goofed up, was late, and we had to stop 
training. I'm always doing things like that that.
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>I- I mean... just today I goofed up, was late, and we had to stop 
<story>training. I'm always doing things like that that.

data.text:
Like the time I tried to get the training records in order and 
accidentally deleted everything, or the time I tried to help 
maintain the track and got tangled up with the road roller...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>Like the time I tried to get the training records in order and 
<story>accidentally deleted everything, or the time I tried to help 
<story>maintain the track and got tangled up with the road roller...

data.text:
The time I messed up step practice and got sand everywhere, 
the time I tried getting water and got soaked, the time I got a 
towel caught in a zipper and the metal bits flew out―
data.name: Meisho Doto

choices.text: I-It's okay, you don't need to keep going.
choices.processed: <size=40>I-It's okay, you don't need to keep going.</size>

data.processed:
<story>The time I messed up step practice and got sand everywhere, 
<story>the time I tried getting water and got soaked, the time I got a 
<story>towel caught in a zipper and the metal bits flew out―

data.text: It's not okayyyyy!!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: It's not okayyyyy!!

data.text:
I already cause so, so much trouble for you as it is, Trainer-san... 
I can't waste any more of your precious tiiiiime....!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>I already cause so, so much trouble for you as it is, Trainer-san... 
<story>I can't waste any more of your precious tiiiiime....!

data.text:
While it's true she was clumsy beyond belief, that's no reason 
for her to feel so guilty. Because no matter what――
data.processed:
<story>While it's true she was clumsy beyond belief, that's no reason 
<story>for her to feel so guilty. Because no matter what――

data.text:
I'm her trainer. No matter how much trouble she causes, I'll 
gladly do everything in my power to help her grow. I wanted her 
to understand that.
data.processed:
<story>I'm her trainer. No matter how much trouble she causes, I'll 
<story>gladly do everything in my power to help her grow. I wanted her 
<story>to understand that.

data.text: AWAAAAAAAAAAAAH!?
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: AWAAAAAAAAAAAAH!?

data.text: L-l-look out the window...! My jersey's flying awayyyyyy!!!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: L-l-look out the window...! My jersey's flying awayyyyyy!!!

data.text: Ah! What if turning it toward the wind to make it dry faster came back to bite me...!? I- I need to go get iiiittt!!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: Ah! What if turning it toward the wind to make it dry faster came back to bite me...!? I- I need to go get iiiittt!!

data.text: Awhhaa!? I- I'm sorr―― UWAH!? I'm sorry, so sorry...! W-wait uuuuupp...!!!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: Awhhaa!? I- I'm sorr―― UWAH!? I'm sorry, so sorry...! W-wait uuuuupp...!!!

data.text:
She dashed away without giving me so much as a second to stop 
her. But not without running into a desk first...
data.processed:
<story>She dashed away without giving me so much as a second to stop 
<story>her. But not without running into a desk first...

data.text:
I wanted her to think of me as "someone she's free to trouble". 
Still without a clue how to do that, I ran after her.
data.processed:
<story>I wanted her to think of me as "someone she's free to trouble". 
<story>Still without a clue how to do that, I ran after her.

data.text: My jerseyyyy...!!!! Come baaaaaaaaaaaaackkkk........ Bwuh!!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: My jerseyyyy...!!!! Come baaaaaaaaaaaaackkkk........ Bwuh!!

title: I don't want to cause trouble
